columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the role definition.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a role definition uniquely.

columns.name: role_name
columns.description: Current state of the role definition.

columns.name: assignable_scopes
columns.description: A list of assignable scopes for which the role definition can be assigned.

columns.name: permissions
columns.description: A list of actions, which can be accessed.
